DOC.brief_summary: The investigator study aim evaluate efficacy PSU heel cushion treatment plantar fasciitis . The investigator randomize controlled trial patient plantar fasciitis compare stretching exercise alone . The outcome measurement include heel pain improvement , compliance , satisfaction , foot functional score 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Patient plantar fasciitis Rheumatologic problem rheumatoid arthritis Latex allergy Pregnancy Previous surgery around foot ankle
